embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/JOXwclgvXB0?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/JOXwclgvXB0?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
If your Python application has users, you should be worried about security.
This talk will cover advanced material, highlighting common mistakes. Topics
will include hashing and salts, timing attacks, serialization, and much more.
Expect eye opening demos, and an urge to go fix your code right away.
title: Advanced Security Topics
